Controller

Class ReviewsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ReviewsController

  • public class ReviewsController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String FILENAME
      The file name of the database file that this controller will access

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReviewsController()
      Default constructor
      ReviewsController(MoviesController movieCtrl)
      Parameterized constructor with user-defined Movie Controller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(Movie movie, java.lang.String username, double numOfStars, java.lang.String additionalComment)
      CREATE a new Review and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Review object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Review object will be written to a new file and saved
      MoviesController getMovieCtrl()
      Gets the Movie Controller that this controller is referencing
      void setMoviesCtrl(MoviesController moviesCtrl)
      Change the Movie Controller that this controller is referencing

    • Method Detail

      • getMovieCtrl

        public MoviesController getMovieCtrl()
        Gets the Movie Controller that this controller is referencing
        Returns:
        MoviesController This controller's Movie Controller

      • setMoviesCtrl

        public void setMoviesCtrl(MoviesController moviesCtrl)
        Change the Movie Controller that this controller is referencing
        Parameters:
        moviesCtrl - This controller's new Movie Controller

      • create

        public void create(Movie movie,
                   java.lang.String username,
                   double numOfStars,
                   java.lang.String additionalComment)
        CREATE a new Review and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Review object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Review object will be written to a new file and saved
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie that this Review will be added to
        username - Username of Reviewer
        numOfStars - Number of stars given by reviewer, between 0 - 5 (inclusive)
        additionalComment - Additional comment given by Reviewer (optional)
